name: Coffee Shenanigans
description:
Have you always wanted to be a barista? Now is your chance to shine!  Coffee Shenanigans is a 2D point-and-click barista simulator, where you need to do your best to keep your customers happy by making them best coffee possible.  Will they order espresso, latte or iced americano? While making coffee, you also get to know your customers.  Sometimes they can be quite bizarre people. I wonder if something strange will happen?

Coffee Shenanigans is a school project made by three Finnish university students. The game is made in Godot using Escoria framework.
